businessUsage: The AI platform analyzes financial transactions, detects fraudulent activities, and provides real-time alerts to the finance team.
keyActivity: The primary activity is to automate fraud detection and financial reporting, integrating real-time transaction analysis.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correct fraud detections over total transactions
Time taken to analyze each transaction showing responsiveness
Proportion of correct fraud detections among all detected fraud activities
Completeness in detecting all fraudulent cases showing coverage
Balanced measure combining relevance and completeness showing stability

modelDescription: The model detects fraudulent transactions by analyzing transaction patterns and identifying anomalies.
modelInput: Transaction Details, User Activity, Location Data
modelPurpose: To detect and prevent fraudulent activities in financial transactions.
modelSummary: The model helps to monitor financial transactions and provides alerts for potential fraud cases.
modelUsage: The model is used to analyze real-time transactions, detect suspicious activities, and provide insights for further investigation.

businessUsage: The AI Marketing Platform analyzes customer behavior, personalizes marketing campaigns, and optimizes ad spending.
keyActivity: The primary activity is to automate campaign personalization and marketing spend optimization.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correctly predicted customer behaviors over total predictions
Time taken to generate personalized content
Proportion of successful campaign deliveries
Completeness in reaching target audience
Balanced measure combining campaign success and audience reach

modelDescription: The model personalizes marketing content based on customer behavior and preferences.
modelInput: Customer Data, Campaign Objectives, Ad Spend
modelOutput: Personalized Ads, Campaign Reports, Customer Segments
modelPurpose: To personalize marketing campaigns and optimize ad spend for better customer engagement.
modelSummary: The model personalizes marketing campaigns and optimizes ad spend.
modelUsage: The model is used to generate personalized ad content and optimize ad placement.

businessUsage: The AI HR Platform automates the onboarding process, handles employee inquiries, and provides insights for HR decisions.
keyActivity: The primary activity is to automate repetitive HR tasks and provide quick responses.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correct responses to employee queries
Time taken to respond to employee queries
Proportion of correct responses to all responses
Completeness in providing relevant information
Balanced measure combining response relevance and completeness

modelDescription: The model automates the HR onboarding process and provides answers to common employee questions.
modelInput: Employee Data, HR Policies, Training Materials
modelOutput: Onboarding Documents, Answers to Queries, Performance Reports
modelPurpose: To automate HR processes and provide quick and accurate information to employees.
modelSummary: The model streamlines HR processes and provides instant access to information.
modelUsage: The model is used to manage employee onboarding and answer general HR queries.

businessUsage: The AI platform analyzes the requirements of software development projects, generates code, and streamlines the development life cycle.
keyActivity: The primary activity is to automate the code generation and streamline the development lifecycle.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correctly generated code functionalities
Time taken for code generation and analysis
Proportion of functional code modules
Completeness in generating code for all project requirements
Balanced measure combining relevance and completeness showing stability

modelDescription: The model automates code generation and assists in software development.
modelInput: Project Requirements, Design Specifications, Code Examples
modelPurpose: To automate and streamline the software development lifecycle.
modelSummary: The model speeds up software development by generating code and automating testing.
modelUsage: The model is used to generate code snippets, debug existing code, and create test cases.

businessUsage: The AI medical platform helps in diagnosis, treatment suggestions, and drug interaction analysis.
keyActivity: The primary activity is to provide diagnostic support and drug interaction analysis.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correct diagnoses over total cases
Time taken to generate medical reports
Proportion of correct diagnoses among all generated suggestions
Completeness in identifying all possible conditions
Balanced measure combining diagnostic accuracy and coverage

modelDescription: The model offers diagnostic support, treatment suggestions, and drug interaction analysis.
modelInput: Patient Symptoms, Medical History, Test Results
modelOutput: Diagnosis, Treatment Suggestions, Drug Interaction Reports
modelPurpose: To assist medical professionals with diagnosis and treatment decisions.
modelSummary: The model assists in diagnosis and treatment suggesting possible conditions and drug interaction analysis.
modelUsage: The model is used by medical professionals to provide diagnostic support.
